feed.title: bknd Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • admin ui: fixing condition where entity has been created with empty label by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/30
  • optimize client-side api & hooks by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/31
  • node media storage local adapter by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/25
  • improved cloudflare worker adapter by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/27
  • optimize seeding, adding api typing support by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/32
  • unified framework and runtime adapters by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/34

Doc Updates

  • added extensive setup instructions at https://docs.bknd.io/setup/introduction
  • added initial structure & seeding instructions at https://docs.bknd.io/setup/database#initial-structure
  • updated integrations: frameworks and runtimes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.3.2...v0.4.0

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor module schema handling and add sync mechanism by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/41
  • refactor: remove cjs from build to reduce package size by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/35
  • refactor: extracted auth as middleware to be added manually to endpoints by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/36
  • feat: allow data query to have single string as sort by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/37
  • optimized vite adapter with better defaults by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/38
  • React Elements: Auth, Media by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/39

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update plasmic package to omit cjs by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/45
  • refactor event system to support returnable events by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/46
  • fix advanced flow creation due to schema mismatches by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/44
  • optimize elements by reducing the bundle size required by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/42
  • recursive with by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/48
  • DataApi: automatically switch to POST if the URL is too long by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/49
  • Create users in Admin UI by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/50
  • Admin UI improvements by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/51
  • Admin UI: Adding context menu to entities list by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/52
  • reduce ui bundle size by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/43

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for bknd: 0.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix auth screens' missing config permission, and media URL resolution by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/53

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.6.0...0.6.1

entry.title: New release for bknd: 0.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • bknd/plasmic: added helper functions for integration by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/55
  • fixed schema updates to fail in nextjs envs due to lodash's merge by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/54
  • restructured elements for better customization by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/57

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/0.6.1...0.6.2
